text:
Hello,

We seem to be experiencing alot of memory problems recently with apache. The bug report can be found here:

https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/230878

If you have any questions please let me know.

Thanks
chuck
creator: zulcss@ubuntu.com
slive@apache.org
text:
I don't see any evidence of any Apache httpd "memory problems" in the linked bug report.

What I see in the report is someone with a limited-memory server running something under apache httpd that causes it to use lots of memory. PHP scripts or other third-party modules would be the most likely placed to look. Additional help could be found on the users@httpd.apache.org mailing list.
